official-title.#text: To require the President to implement the recommendations of the President’s Review Group on Intelligence and Communications Technologies.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#tail: , and in addition to the Committees on
, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

short-title.#text: Big Brother Is Not Watching You Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: and all Executive Departments and Independent Agencies shall take all such actions, including all necessary rulemaking, needed to implement the 46 enumerated recommendations of the report entitled

quote.#tail: issued on December 12, 2013, by the President’s Review Group on Intelligence and Communications Technologies.
quote.#text: Liberty and Security in a Changing World

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , Executive Departments, and Independent Agencies are granted all statutory authority necessary and proper to implement the recommendations referred to in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Big Brother Is Not Watching You Act/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: of this Act shall be concluded within one year of the enactment of this Act.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Big Brother Is Not Watching You Act/s:1

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: of this Act shall be issued within six months of the enactment of this Act.
